item.description:
Announcement from Buddy Dog Humane Society (http://www.buddydoghs.com/):

Look who is coming to our October 13th Buddy Dog Humane Society’s Woofstock Festival:

Cody’s Creations* Family Dog Training*
New England Pet Hospice* Save A Dog, Inc.
Phinney’s Friends AdopTee’s
Arbonne International Pat Brody Shelter for Cats
Especially For Pets Worcester Animal Rescue League
All American Dachshund IVG Metrowest
Cool Canine Collars CaRMaH
Fantasy Faces N More Baypath Humane Society
The Boxer Rescue Dirty Hairy’s Dogwash and Grooming
Carmah Cat Rescue MA Vest-a-Dog
Cute Critters Sleeping Bear Co.
Northeast All Retriever Rescue Merrimack River Feline Rescue Society
Nutra-9 Furever Dachshund Rescue
Lucky Pup Rescue Poppin Good
Fairy Dog Parents Silver Birch Studio and Elements
French Bulldog Rescue Network Companion Animals in Retirement, Inc.
Rescued Rottweilers United with Friends and Family, Inc.

*Special thank you to our wonderfully generous sponsors: Family Dog Training, Regan Plumbing, IVG Metrowest, Cody’s Creations, Roche Bros., Bill Semple Lawn and Landscaping, Inc, and N.E. Pet Hospice, Inc.

We are so excited to be getting ready for our big “Woofstock” Festival again! Last year’s festival was a terrific success and we expect this year will be even bigger and better!!

Despite the heavy rains which fell on October 1, 2011, our first Woofstock, we had over 1,200 visitors! They enjoyed 100 vendors booths, raffles, contests, prizes, agility and law enforcement demonstrations, and the live music of Shakedown Street.
item.name: Buddy Dog's October 13th WOOFSTOCK!
